mapper.select: WITH avg_review_stat(seller_id,avg_score) AS ( SELECT s.seller_id, AVG(r.review_score) as avg_score FROM seller s INNER JOIN product p ON s.seller_id=p.seller_id INNER JOIN review r ON r.product_id=p.product_id GROUP BY s.seller_id ) SELECT * FROM seller sl INNER JOIN avg_review_stat ars ON sl.seller_id=ars.seller_id INNER JOIN reliable_table rt ON ars.avg_score BETWEEN rt.grade_low AND rt.grade_high WHERE sl.seller_id=#{seller_id}
